title: Welding Farming Equipment - NEW UNKNOWN TILLER + Kubota L2502

tasks.task: Arc welding a crack in a farming or construction equipment component.
subtasks: Cleaning the area around the crack.
Examining the crack to determine its extent.
Attempting to weld the crack using personal welding skills.
Addressing a gas interruption during welding.
Planning to repaint the welded area.
Scheduling a follow-up repair for the incomplete weld.
